20101209010053.667|20101209010055.333|CCO|POLITICAL OPERATIVE AND I DON'T

20101209010344.000|20101209010346.000|CCO|POSITIVE IMPACT ON GROWTH AND 
20101209010346.000|20101209010348.000|CCO|JOBS.

20101209010704.857|20101209010706.286|CCO|PRESERVE MIDDLE CLASS TAX CUTS 
20101209010706.286|20101209010707.714|CCO|AS WELL AS THE OTHER PROGRAMS 
20101209010707.714|20101209010709.143|CCO|LIKE I MENTIONED.
20101209010709.143|20101209010710.571|CCO|>> WITH ALL DUE RESPECT, YOU
